Rulings.Edison:
●“This card Cannot be Special Summoned from the GY” is not an effect.
●This effect targets 1 Spell Card in your GY.If you have 3 or more Spellcaster-Type monsters in your GY, including “Ice Queen” after it is sent to the GY, you can activate the effect.
●If “Ice Queen” is equipped to “Relinquished” while face-up and is destroyed and sent to the GY, you can activate the effect.

●This effect targets 1 Spell Card in your GY.If you have 3 or more Spellcaster-Type monsters in your GY, including “Ice Queen” after it is sent to the GY, you can activate the effect.
●If “Ice Queen” is equipped to “Relinquished” while face-up and is destroyed and sent to the GY, you can activate the effect.

Rulings.Base:
1. "This card cannot be Special Summoned from the GY" is not an effect.
2. This effect targets 1 Spell Card in your GY.
3. If you have 3 or more Spellcaster-Type monsters in your GY, including "Ice Queen" after it is sent to the GY, you can activate the effect.
4. If "Ice Queen" is equipped to "Relinquished" while face-up and is destroyed and sent to the GY, you can activate the effect.
